item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

Dont we all want one! Well this is the wrong post if you want one.

Anyway on subject

Well i want to make it so you need to have a certain part of a quest to buy a certain item from any shop.

I though of something like this

if (shopItems == 1111 && q1stage = 2) { sendMessage("You need to get the golden key back to the guide before you can buy this item!"); }

but shopItem isnt recognized. Does anyone know what i put there instead?

Like shopItemId but thats not either
